languages.text: "Если вы столь уверены, Ваша Светлость... я прослежу за выполнением приговора".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы столь уверены, Ваша Светлость... я прослежу за выполнением приговора".

languages.text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."
languages.original_text: "Если вы столь уверены, Ваша Светлость... я прослежу за выполнением приговора".

traits.locale_text: "If you're adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."
"If you're adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."
"If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."
"If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."
"If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

languages.text: “如果您坚持这样做的话，大人……我会确保对他们的惩罚会落到实处。”
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: “如果您坚持这样做的话，大人……我会确保对他们的惩罚会落到实处。”

languages.text: «Si insiste, mi{mf|lord|lady}... me aseguraré de que se ejecuta la sentencia».
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: «Si insiste, mi{mf|lord|lady}... me aseguraré de que se ejecuta la sentencia».

languages.text: 「陛下、そこまでおっしゃるのであれば…刑が確実に執行されるように手配いたします」
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、そこまでおっしゃるのであれば…刑が確実に執行されるように手配いたします」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr darauf besteht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die Strafe vollstreckt wird."
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr darauf besteht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die Strafe vollstreckt wird."

languages.text: « Si telle est votre décision, Votre Seigneurie... Je m'assurerai qu'elle soit appliquée. »
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: « Si telle est votre décision, Votre Seigneurie... Je m'assurerai qu'elle soit appliquée. »

languages.text: "Bu konuda katı bir tavır sergileyecekseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, cezanın işleme koyulmasını sağlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "If you are adamant about this, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will ensure that the sentence is carried out."

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuda katı bir tavır sergileyecekseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, cezanın işleme koyulmasını sağlayacağım."
